Class Flight

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.Flight

extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a flight that the company performs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Flight

        public Flight(java.lang.String code,
              Route r,
              java.util.Calendar dateDeparture,
              java.util.Calendar dateDestination,
              double price,
              java.lang.String codeAirplane)
        Constructs a new flight. Seats are not added.
        Parameters:
        code - Code of the flight.
        r - Route of the flight.
        dateDeparture - Departure's date.
        dateDestination - Arrival's date.
        price - Price of a ticket in the second class of the flight.
        codeAirplane - Code of the airplane.

      • Flight

        public Flight(java.lang.String code,
              Route r,
              java.util.Calendar dateDeparture,
              java.util.Calendar dateDestination,
              double price)
        Constructs a new flight. Seats and codeAirplane not added.
        Parameters:
        code - Code of the flight.
        r - Route of the flight.
        dateDeparture - Departure's date.
        dateDestination - Arrival's date.
        price - Price of a ticket in the second class of the flight.

      • Flight

        public Flight(Route r,
              java.util.Calendar dateDeparture)
        Constructs a new flight. The code of the flight is initialized to null and the price to 0.
        Parameters:
        r - Route of the flight.
        dateDeparture - Departure's date.

      • Flight
